title: SMC_ParameterNumber_CoE (Function)
text:
FUNCTION SMC_ParameterNumber_CoE : DINT
This function translates from a CANopen object index/subindex
pair to a SoftMotion parameter number that can be used with
function blocks like
MC_ReadParameter
,
MC_ReadBoolParameter
,
MC_WriteParameter
, and
MC_WriteBoolParameter
.

rows:
The data length in bytes (1, 2, or 4).
Only used when writing a parameter.
